TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Signature extends System.Object

summary.span: Rappresenta l'elemento di una firma XML.

span.span: Represents the element of an XML signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il classe rappresenta la <`Signature`> elemento di una firma XML definita dalla specifica di firma digitale XML.The class represents the <`Signature`> element of an XML signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. Il <`Signature`> elemento Ã¨ l'elemento radice di una firma digitale XML.The <`Signature`> element is the root element of an XML digital signature. Il , , , e incapsulano i sottoelementi del <`Signature`> elemento.The , , , and properties encapsulate the subelements of the <`Signature`> element. Per altre informazioni sul <`Signature`> elemento, vedere il W3C specifica a www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.For more information about the <`Signature`> element, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples Il codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il classe con il classe per firmare e verificare un documento XML con una firma protetta.The following code example uses the class with the class to sign and verify an XML document using an envelope signature. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope/VB/sample.vb#1)] Il codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il classe con il classe per accedere a un oggetto e verificare un documento XML con una firma detached.The following code example uses the class with the class to sign an object and verify an XML document using a detached signature. [!code-cpp[XMLDSIG - Signature - Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/XMLDSIG - Signature - Detached/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XMLDSIG - Signature - Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/XMLDSIG - Signature - Detached/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XMLDSIG - Signature - Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/XMLDSIG - Signature - Detached/VB/sample.vb#1)]
